hero.title: Precision Engineering Solutions
hero.subtitle: Delivering High-Quality Brass Precision Components for Automotive, Electric, and Pneumatic Industries

meta.title: Precision Components Manufacturing | Metalloid Services
meta.description: Leading brass precision component manufacturer with 25 years of expertise, offering OEM, customization, and 24/7 customer support across multiple industries.

cta.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
cta.subtitle: Partner with Metalloid for cutting-edge precision component solutions tailored to your specific requirements

items.title: OEM Manufacturing Services
items.description: Metalloid specializes in original equipment manufacturer (OEM) services, delivering precision-engineered brass components that meet the highest industry standards. Our expertise spans automotive, electric, and pneumatic sectors.

items.title: Laser Marking Services
items.description: Our advanced laser marking technology ensures precise, permanent identification and branding of components. We provide high-quality marking solutions for traceability, serialization, and aesthetic customization.

items.title: 24/7 Customer Support
items.description: Metalloid provides round-the-clock customer support to ensure seamless communication, rapid problem resolution, and continuous project management. Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you.

services.title: Our Service Offerings
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Precision Manufacturing Solutions Across Multiple Industries

items.title: Advanced Production Capabilities
items.description: Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility enables high-volume, precision component production with exceptional efficiency and reliability.

items.title: Technical Engineering Mastery
items.description: With 25 years of engineering experience, we leverage cutting-edge technologies to deliver innovative, high-performance precision components.

items.title: Precision and Quality Assurance
items.description: Our rigorous quality control processes ensure exceptional precision, consistency, and reliability in every component we manufacture.

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Advanced Technology and Precision Engineering at Your Service

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Comprehensive project assessment, understanding client requirements, and defining precise specifications.

steps.title: Design and Engineering
steps.description: Collaborative design process, creating detailed technical drawings and 3D prototypes using advanced CAD technologies.

steps.title: Material Selection
steps.description: Carefully selecting optimal brass alloys and materials to meet specific performance and durability requirements.

steps.title: Precision Manufacturing
steps.description: Utilizing advanced CNC machining and precision manufacturing techniques to create components with exceptional accuracy.

steps.title: Quality Inspection
steps.description: Rigorous multi-stage quality control, including dimensional verification, material testing, and performance evaluation.

steps.title: Delivery and Support
steps.description: Careful packaging, timely delivery, and ongoing technical support to ensure complete customer satisfaction.

manufacturing-process.title: Our Manufacturing Process
manufacturing-process.subtitle: Systematic Approach Ensuring Excellence in Every Component
